I would recommend this game if your going to buy prime, casual is fun and the people in it are funny to listen to, if you want this for competitive mode dont if you dont buy prime, the vac system is great and there is a huge problem with cheaters

Nowadays, the game is just full of hackers and playing it for free is not a good idea, many of you probably noticed that. But it can still be a fun time, especially using the workshop maps. Then again, if you really want to play seriously, you should really consider buying prime.

Really good competitive game, people complain about the Cheater Problem but I've only ever come against 2 or 3 blatant cheaters since the Trust Factor update hit and I get one or two suspicious people every few games but it's probably me just being salty about being outplayed xD and the fact that I have a high Trust Factor rating. Valve gives frequent, good quality updates so the game is definitely not dead. 

My advice for a beginner- Buy Prime and try not to be toxic otherwise you'll get a low Trust Factor and be put in games with lots of cheaters and kids......

One of my favourite games of all time! However, regular Matchmaking is filled with cheaters and Valve doesn't seem to do anything about it, so i would recommend using 3rd party services like FACEIT or ESEA. Other than that its a great game with really interesting mechanics.
